subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Accidents and Safety
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A wreck during practice forced Dale Earnhardt Jr. into a backup car and to the back of the field for Sunday’s season-opening race.
snippet: A wreck during practice forced Dale Earnhardt Jr. into a backup car and to the back of the field for Sunday’s season-opening race.
